item.title: How to add a new chart type to dc.js
item.description: This is a step by step description of how I extended dc.js with a new chart type. It is inspired by a wiki page by Thomas Robert. A Bullet chart Mike Bostock already implemented a bullet chart in D3.js. The vertical version from Jason Davies uses the official code which is available as a d3-plugin. (I have submitted a proposal for a bug fix and will use it instead.)

item.title: wiki of the future?
item.description: Last weekend I have been watching, reading and playing around with Ward Cunningham's Smallest Federated Wiki. As usual he is a great designer and aims to simple, effective, understandable and useful tools! I particularly like the plugins idea (not new of course) and how easy it seems to be to add new ones, like support for MathJax: Get inspired you too!
